Topic: Create a routine you'll love with a 5-Day Membership at Endeavor
Run date: 08.21.25 moved run date to 9/18
Approach: 
    Endeavor’s 5-day membership offers the flexibility to come in any 5 days a month, allowing you to work whenever it fits your schedule.
    You'll also enjoy additional benefits like access to conference rooms, invitations to networking events (including the free Collaborators & Cocktails events), and an overall productivity boost.
    Back-to-school season is here, and if you're looking to establish a new routine, this membership gives you an easy way to incorporate working outside the home into your regular schedule — without committing to a full-time membership.
    Whether you're a freelancer, a remote worker, or a startup CEO, this plan is designed to fit seamlessly into your work-life balance:
        The freelancer (show how flexible workspaces, private phone booths in the Sandbox, and access to high-speed internet can boost productivity)
        The remote worker (show how Endeavor's collaborative spaces reduce isolation while providing networking events)
        The startup CEO (Highlight how Endeavor's community can connect them with other industry experts)
